item.title: [khm] A-Goldspan Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying, haste

Whenever A-Goldspan Dragon attacks, create a Treasure token.

Treasures you control have "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add two mana of any one color."

item.title: [khm] A-Cosmos Elixir
item.description:
Artifact

At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if your life total is greater than your starting life total. Otherwise, you gain 2 life and scry 1.

item.title: [khm] A-Esika's Chariot
item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Vehicle

When Esika's Chariot enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Cat creature token.

Whenever Esika's Chariot attacks, create a token that's a copy of target token you control.

Crew 2

item.title: [khm] A-Faceless Haven
item.description:
Snow Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{S}{S}{S}: Faceless Haven becomes a 3/3 creature with vigilance and all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

item.title: [afr] A-Demilich
item.description:
Creature — Skeleton Wizard

This spell costs {U} less to cast for each instant and sorcery spell you've cast this turn.

Whenever Demilich attacks, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy.

You may cast Demilich from your graveyard by exiling four instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard in addition to paying its other costs.

item.title: [afr] A-Druid Class
item.description:
Enchantment — Class

(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

{2}{G}: Level 2

You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

{2}{G}: Level 3

When this Class becomes level 3, target land you control becomes a creature with haste and "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control." It's still a land.

item.title: [afr] A-Wizard Class
item.description:
Enchantment — Class

(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)

You have no maximum hand size.

{2}{U}: Level 2

When this Class becomes level 2, draw two cards.

{2}{U}: Level 3

Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

item.title: [znr] A-Luminarch Aspirant
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

item.title: [znr] A-Omnath, Locus of Creation
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elemental

When Omnath, Locus of Creation enters the battlefield, scry 1.

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 4 life if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. If it's the second time, add {R}{G}{W}{U}. If it's the third time, Omnath deals 4 damage to each opponent and each planeswalker you don't control.

item.title: [znr] A-Phylath, World Sculptor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elemental

Trample

When Phylath, World Sculptor enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each basic land you control.

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put four +1/+1 counters on target Plant you control. It gains trample until end of turn.

item.title: [y22] Garruk, Wrath of the Wilds
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Garruk

+1: Choose a creature card in your hand. it perpetually gets +1/+1 and perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

−1: Draft a card from Garruk, Wrath of the Wild's spellbook and put it onto the battlefield.

−5: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample.

item.title: [y22] Predatory Sludge
item.description:
Creature — Ooze

Menance

As Predatory Sludge enters the battlefield, choose a permanent you don't control. When the chosen permanent is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, conjure a card named Predatory Sludge into your hand.

item.title: [pres] End-Raze Forerunners
item.description:
Creature — Boar

Vigilance, trample, haste

When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Swamp
item.description:
Basic Land — Swamp

({T}: Add {B}.)

item.title: [sld] Mountain
item.description:
Basic Land — Mountain

({T}: Add {R}.)

item.title: [y22] Rahilda, Wanted Cutthroat // Rahilda, Feral Outlaw
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Werewolf // Legendary Creature — Human Werewolf

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/alchemy-innistrad

item.title: [y22] Grizzled Huntmaster
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

When Grizzled Huntmaster enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your hand. If you do, search your hand and library for any number of card with the same name, exile them, then shuffle. Choose a creature card you own from outside the game. Conjure a duplicate of that card into your hand for each card exiled from your hand this way.

https://twitter.com/AliEldrazi/status/1468340761133555716

item.title: [y22] Geistpack Alpha
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Trample

When Geistpack Alpha dies, seek a permanent card with mana value equal to the number of lands you control.

https://twitter.com/AliEldrazi/status/1468338105807745025

item.title: [y22] Hinterland Chef
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

When Hinterland Chef enters the battlefield, draft a card from Hinterland Chef's spellbook. It perpetually becomes a Food artifact into addition to its other types and perpetually gains "{2}, {T}: Sacrifice this creature, you gain 3 life."

https://twitter.com/AliEldrazi/status/1468344615371776002

item.title: [y22] Hollowhenge Wrangler
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

When Hollowhenge Wrangler enters the battlefield, seek a land card.

Discard a land card: Conjure a card named Hollowhenge Wrangler into your hand. You may also activate this ability while Hollowhenge Wrangler is in your graveyard.

https://twitter.com/AliEldrazi/status/1468350032634126337

item.title: [y22] Lupine Harbingers
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Trample, haste

Lupine Harbingers enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of turns you've begun since it was foretold.

Foretell {4}{G}{G}

https://twitter.com/AliEldrazi/status/1468377587181309954

item.title: [y22] Tenacious Pup
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

When Tenacious Pup enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. When you cast your next creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter, trample counter, and vigilance counter on it.

https://twitter.com/MTGNerdGirl/status/1468399936362459137

item.title: [y22] Antique Collector
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Antique Collector can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

When Antique Collector enters the battlefield, creatures you control perpetually gain "When this creature dies, you may shuffle it into its owner's library if its in your graveyard. If you do, investigate."

https://twitter.com/MTGNerdGirl/status/1468399936362459137

item.title: [y22] Ravenous Pursuit
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +X/+X, where X is the amount of excess damage dealt this way.

https://twitter.com/AliEldrazi/status/1468407592779137029

item.title: [y22] Soulstealer Axe
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has trample

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, seek a card with mana value equal to that damage.

Equip {2}

https://twitter.com/MTGNerdGirl/status/1468415036188246019

item.title: [y22] Wickerwing Effigy
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Scarecrow

Defender

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You may cast creature spells from the top of your library.

Whenever you cast a creature spell from your library, it becomes a black Bird in addition to its other colors and types, has flying, and has base power and toughness 1/1.

https://twitter.com/MTGNerdGirl/status/1468415036188246019?s=20

item.title: [y22] Key to the Archive
item.description:
Artifact

Key to the Archive enters the battlefield tapped.

When Key to the Archive enters the battlefield, draft a card from Key to the Archive's spellbook, then discard a card.

{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors.

https://twitter.com/MTGNerdGirl/status/1468415036188246019

item.title: [y22] Settle the Wilds
item.description:
Sorcery

Seek a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then seek a permanent card with mana value equal to the number of lands you control.

https://twitter.com/AliEldrazi/status/1468417704658968583

item.title: [prm] Enter the Infinite
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

item.title: [a22] Brittle Blast
item.description:
Instant

Creatures and planeswalkers your opponents control perpetually gain "If this permanent would die, exile it instead." Brittle Blast deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467822630438940680

item.title: [a22] Conductive Current
item.description:
Sorcery

Conductive Current deals 3 damage to each creature. Choose an instant or sorcery card in your hand. It perpetually gains "If this spell would deal noncombat damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 instead."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467834600374292489

item.title: [a22] Bloodrage Alpha
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

When Bloodrage Alpha enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Another target Wolf or Werewolf you control fights target creature you don't control.

• When you cast your next Wolf or Werewolf spell, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467816860829859840

item.title: [a22] Arms Scavenger
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

At the beginning of your upkeep, draft a card from Arms Scavenger's spellbook, then exile it. Until the end of turn, you may play that card.

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467804327649624064

item.title: [a22] Electrostatic Blast
item.description:
Instant

Electrostatic Blast deals 2 damage to any target. When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, exile the top three cards of your library. You may play one of those cards until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467857568592769029

item.title: [a22] Frenzied Geistblaster
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Prowess

When Frenzied Geistblaster enters the battlefield, if there are twenty or more instant and/or sorcery cards among cards in your graveyard, hand, and library, you may discard a card. If you do, seek an instant or sorcery card.

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467857740068491266

item.title: [a22] Fearsome Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

At the beginning of your end step, each Dragon card in your hand perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467866538623619072

item.title: [a22] Town-razer Tyrant
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Town-razer Tyrant enters the battlefield, target land you don't control loses all abilities except mana abilities and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, this permanent deals 2 damage to you unless you sacrifice it."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467869860071882753

item.title: [a22] Tibalt, Wicked Tormenter
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Tibalt

+1: Add {R}{R}. Draft a card from Tibalt, Wicked Tormenter's spellbook, then exile it. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

+1: Tibalt, Wicked Tormenter deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker unless its controller has Tibalt deal 3 damage to them. If they do, you may discard a card. If you do, draw card.

−X: Create X 1/1 red Devil creature tokens with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467881174664101891

item.title: [a22] Cursebound Witch
item.description:
Creature — Human Warlock

When Cursebound Witch dies, draft a card from Cursebound Witch's spellbook.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467952774449025024

item.title: [a22] Break Expectations
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals all cards with mana value 2 or greater in their hand. You choose a card from among those cards. Exile that card. If a card was exiled this way, that player drafts a card from Break Expectations's spellbook and reveals it.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467950100970291200

item.title: [a22] Veteran Ghoulcaller
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Menace

Whenever a card in your graveyard is put into your hand, conjure a duplicate of that card into your hand.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467958259399073794

item.title: [a22] Sap Vitality
item.description:
Instant

Sap Vitality deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +3/+0.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467957155928035329

item.title: [a22] Sanguine Brushstroke
item.description:
Enchantment

When Sanguine Brushstroke enters the battlefield, create a Blood token and conjure a card named Blood Artist onto the battlefield.

Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467956565906886656

item.title: [a22] Citystalker Connoisseur
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Deathtouch

When Citystalker Connoisseur enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card with the greatest mana value among cards in their hand. Create a Blood token.

item.title: [a22] Assemble from Parts
item.description:
Instant

Target creature card in your graveyard perpetually gains "{3}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Shuffle it into your library. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery."

https://twitter.com/numotthenummy/status/1467949008706748416

item.title: [a22] Puppet Raiser
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, seek a creature card with mana value equal to that mana value of that card plus one. That card perpetually gains menace.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467956057515302915

item.title: [a22] Gutmorn, Pactbound Servant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, deathtouch

Whenever Gutmorn, Pactbound Servant enters the battlefield, each player discard a nonland card.

Whenever a player discards a card during your turn, they choose another player That player conjures a duplicate of that card into their hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467953751164010497

item.title: [sld] Demonlord Belzenlok
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Demon

Flying, trample

When Demonlord Belzenlok enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then put that card into your hand. If the card's mana value is 4 or greater, repeat this process. Demonlord Belzenlok deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.

item.title: [sld] Razaketh, the Foulblooded
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, trample

Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Liliana's Contract
item.description:
Enchantment

When Liliana's Contract enters the battlefield, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more Demons with different names, you win the game.
